data.subject: Don`t Hate Me
data.lyric:
I watched you fall away
 All inspiration down the hole
 Fading your light to gray
 Now you're gone,

data.subject: Another Time, Another Place
data.lyric:
Another time, another place
 Her candles flicker in the fading light
 I sit alone and watch that lon

data.subject: Make It Hurt
data.lyric:
Don’t feel shit unless it’s pain
 Nothing registers, no not even my name
 If you decide to get close
